markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Weapon Critical Specialization "
    pfs=""
>
[Axe](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=1)
</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 283 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Choose one creature adjacent to the initial target and within reach. If its AC is lower than your attack roll result for the critical hit, you deal damage to that creature equal to the result of the weapon damage die you rolled (including extra dice for its _potency_ rune, if any). This amount isn't doubled, and no bonuses or other additional dice apply to this damage.
name: Axe
search_markdown:
<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 283 <sup>4.0</sup></row>
</additional-info>

---

Choose one creature adjacent to the initial target and within reach. If its AC is lower than your attack roll result for the critical hit, you deal …
</summary>

text: <title level="1" right="Weapon Critical Specialization " pfs="" > Axe Source Core Rulebook pg. 283 4.0 Choose one creature adjacent to the initial target and within reach. If its AC is lower than your attack roll result for the critical hit, you deal damage to that creature equal to the result of the weapon damage die you rolled (including extra dice for its potency rune, if any). This amount isn't doubled, and no bonuses or other additional dice apply to this damage.

<title
    level="1"
    right="Weapon Critical Specialization "
    pfs=""
>
[Bomb](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=2)
</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 284 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Increase the radius of the bomb's [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) damage (if any) to 10 feet.
name: Bomb

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 284 <sup>4.0</sup></row>
</additional-info>

markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Weapon Critical Specialization "
    pfs=""
>
[Bow](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=3)
</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 284 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

If the target of the critical hit is adjacent to a surface, it gets stuck to that surface by the missile. The target is [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24) and must spend an Interact action to attempt a DC 10 [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check to pull the missile free; it can't move from its space until it succeeds. The creature doesn't become stuck if it is incorporeal, is liquid (like a [water elemental](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=45) or some [oozes](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=79)), or could otherwise escape without effort.
name: Bow
search_markdown:
<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 284 <sup>4.0</sup></row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
If the target of the critical hit is adjacent to a surface, it gets stuck to that surface by the missile. The target is  immobilized  and must spend …
</summary>

summary_markdown: If the target of the critical hit is adjacent to a surface, it gets stuck to that surface by the missile. The target is  immobilized  and must spend …
text: <title level="1" right="Weapon Critical Specialization " pfs="" > Bow Source Core Rulebook pg. 284 4.0 If the target of the critical hit is adjacent to a surface, it gets stuck to that surface by the missile. The target is immobilized and must spend an Interact action to attempt a DC 10 Athletics check to pull the missile free; it can't move from its space until it succeeds. The creature doesn't become stuck if it is incorporeal, is liquid (like a water elemental or some oozes), or could otherwise escape without effort.

[Brawling](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=4)
</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 284 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

[Club](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=5)
</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 284 <sup>4.0</sup></row>
